description.name: wetheavaxc
description.tagline: Wrapped Ether avax-c Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto avax-c-weth.e Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped Ether avax-c directly on your website
Unique avax-c/weth.e receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your avax-c/weth.e wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
